arts.ttl: Wolves could make history against Newcastle United for the wrong reasons
arts.sum: In their 127-year history of being in the English Football League, First Division, and Premier League, the Old Gold have never lost their opening four matches. There is a lot on the line as Wolves face Newcastle on Saturday afternoon, including a long-standing record the Old Gold have.

arts.ttl: Roy Keane expects Wolves to do one thing vs Newcastle as Ian Wright changes his mind
arts.sum: Roy Keane expects Wolves to score, but predicts them to lose vs Newcastle Speaking on the Overlap, the Irishman said ‘2 or 3-1, we give Wolves a goal,’ before Ian Wright predicted a 3-0 win for Newcastle.
